description:
A simple tool which helps to sync the clipboard between computers by using a shared folder


What's Changed
- Downgrade Electron to v34 by @felipecrs in #247
  - Because of an issue in Node.js 22: nodejs/node#58223
- Update dependency node-cron to v4 by @renovate in #246
- Update dependency execa to ^9.5.3 by @renovate in #244
Full Changelog: v0.16.3...v0.16.4
